thread.title: Entrepreneur Gary Vaynerchuk Bet Right On Facebook, Wrong on BlackJet

author: Chris Kornelis
title: Entrepreneur Gary Vaynerchuk Bet Right On Facebook, Wrong on BlackJet
text:
Whether heâ€™s on Twitter, Instagram or Facebook, or hosting his podcast or show on YouTube, entrepreneur Gary Vaynerchuk is constantly fielding questions about making it and making money.
The question he gets most often? People are always asking for his permission to do something that they think their family, friends or loved ones might judge them for, he says. Mr. Vaynerchuk says he is happy to oblige, telling them to follow their dreams and blame it on him if they want.
